question: A store offers a 20% discount on all items. If a jacket originally costs $150, and there is an additional 8% sales tax applied after the discount, what is the total amount a customer pays?

Sarah invests $2,000 in an account that earns 4% simple interest annually. After 3 years, she withdraws all the money and invests it in another account that earns 6% compound interest annually. How much money does she have after 2 more years?
A rectangular garden has a length that is 3 times its width. If the perimeter of the garden is 48 feet, what is the area of the garden in square feet?
In a class of 30 students, 18 play basketball, 15 play soccer, and 8 play both sports. How many students play neither basketball nor soccer?
